Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-22870 affecting package prometheus-process-exporter for versions less than 0.8.2-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-22870 affecting package prometheus-process-exporter for versions less than 0.8.2-2. A patched version of the package is available.
